tasks.name: Check that have been cleaned

instructions.name: the removable parts needed for operating the robot

tasks.name: Check that the robot is equipped with
Place a first empty 1-well reservoir in SLOT 11

instructions.name: Place a first empty 1-well reservoir in SLOT 11

tasks.name: Place a sterile rack full of 200 µL filter tips in
Place the magnetic module in SLOT 4
Place a 96 position aluminum block in SLOT 1
Scan the barcode on an empty, sterile 96 well 200 µL PCR plate
Place the empty, sterile 96 well 200 µL PCR plate on the 96 position aluminum block already placed in SLOT 1
Prepare the Reagent Trough 1 (12-well reservoir)
Place the Reagent Trough 1 (12-well reservoir) in SLOT 5
Prepare the Reagent Trough 2 (12-well reservoir) with Elution Buffer
Place the Reagent Trough 2 (1-well reservoir) in SLOT 2
Place the 96 2 mL deep well plate that was output from Station A onto the magnetic module already placed in SLOT 4
Scan the barcode on the 96 2 mL deep well plate that was output from Station A
Double-check that

instructions.name: the positioning of the labware using the outline in the SOP relevant to station B as a reference
the labware is inserted the right way around (well A1 or 1 at the top-left)
the labware is properly clicked into each deck slots

tasks.name: Start the protocol
Scan the barcode on the 96 2mL deep well plate located in SLOT 1
Make sure to:

instructions.name: Remove the 96 2 mL deep well plate from SLOT 4
Seal the 96 2 mL deep well plate with a an aluminum seal
Incubate the 96 deep well plate at 55-57 °C for 30 min

tasks.name: make sure to:

instructions.name: Remove the 96 2mL deep well plate from the incubator
Remove the seal from the 96 2 mL deep well plate
Place the 96 2 mL deep well plate back in SLOT 4 of the same robot
Scan the barcode on the 96 2 mL deep well plate

tasks.name: The protocol might pause due to:

instructions.name: Add new racks full of 200µL filter tips

tasks.name: Collect the 96 well 200 µL PCR plate from SLOT 1. This is the process output
Scan the barcode on the 96 well 200 µL PCR plate from SLOT 1
Remove from the deck and wipe down using wipes wet with ethanol
Wipe down, using wipes wet with ethanol, the magnetic module
Remove from the deck, wash and perform an autoclave cycle on
Wipe down, using wipes wet with a 10% solution of sodium hypochlorite
Wait 30 seconds, then quickly rinse the sodium hypochlorite solution off with distilled water
Wipe down these parts using wipes wet with RNaseZap RNase or RNase AWAY
Wait 30 seconds, then quickly rinse with RNaseZap or RNase AWAY with distilled water
Wipe the robot dry, or let the water evaporate
Wipe down these parts using wipes wet with ethanol
